title: Is it weird that Leona and Braum can't proc shield bash?
body: I mean they literally bash people with their shields.  I dunno, seems like a bit of a missed opportunity.

Technically they could, with Locket of the Iron Salami {{item:3190}}, but it would be incredibly inefficient to only proc shield bash once every 120 seconds XD At that point it would indeed be better to get literally any other rune lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EmEFFNyU,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-11-26T23:11:52.804+0000)
>
> Honestly, im pretty sure it would just check and see your kit has 0 shielding and remove it for another rune, like aftershock if you have no hard CC.

The patch notes say
> We're adding a new Resolve minor rune to the first row, aimed at champs with self-shields as well as damage dealers with shield-granting allies, items, or runes

So I guess the idea is that you _can_ bring Shield Bash on someone that doesn't have a shield in their kit, but it's effectively useless until you get something like Locket, Sterak's, or an ally Janna's E. You could even bring Nullifying Orb or Overheal to get the Shield Bash proc, though I'm unsure how useful that would be lol.

However, I haven't used Shield Bash myself yet, so I don't know the technicalities of it, but theoretically, you could bring it and not even get a single shield all game, making it a wasted rune slot lol
